channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Opt-in
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Opt-in

item.title: CVE-2022-2123|2024-08-03T00:24:44.249Z -- unknown -- wp%20opt-in
item.description: The WP Opt-in WordPress plugin through 1.4.1 is vulnerable to CSRF which allows changed plugin settings and can be used for sending spam emails.
